description: This file defines the HotelsScreen widget for a Flutter application, which displays a list of hotels, provides search functionality, and includes navigation to other screens such as cart, orders, and login. It manages state through providers for hotel data and authentication.

classes.name: HotelsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the hotels listing screen with search and navigation features.

classes.name: _HotelsScreenState
classes.description: State class for HotelsScreen managing UI state, hotel loading, search, and navigation logic.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for HotelsScreen, returning an instance of _HotelsScreenState.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers loading of hotels when the widget is inserted into the widget tree.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HotelsScreen, including app bar, search input, hotel list, and guest message.
